item.title: IP per Container with Calico CNI on DC/OS
item.description: Project Calico is a Layer 3 software defined network that runs well on DC/OS and Mesos. In this blog post we will walk through installing and configuring it on DC/OS 1.9. That will allow us to attach containers to Calico and receive unique IPs for them. We will also examine the security implications and policies that can be applied.
